product_name: SOL Rescue Howler Whistle - Package of 2
long_description: Be sure you're heard with the extremely loud SOL Rescue Howler(TM) whistle. From boating to backcountry skiing, the compact size and light weight of this whistle make it ideal for nearly every outdoor activity. Exceeds Safety of Life at Sea (SOLAS) and U.S. Coast Guard specifications. Package of 2 SOL Rescue Howler whistles.
short_description: Be sure you're heard with the extremely loud SOL Rescue Howler(TM) whistle.
